name: Race Driver: Extreme GT Stunts
description:
Race Driver: Extreme GT Stunts is based on the stunts and unbelievable stunts get ready to do stunts in the air and especially on the ramps. If you are a stunt man and want to make the record in the xtreme drifting real gt stunts than you should fasten your seatbelt and get ready for the burnout. When you make stunts you will see and feel the real flying stunts in the air. During your ride, you have to pick the speed nitro to make the exact stunts with no limits.

Features:
Extreme latest and amazing missions
Realistic car controller and engine physics
Unique impossible tracks with crazy modes
Natural sound effects and interface
